invocations.description: Returns the amount of monsters found in the range distance. Optionally you can add a function to filter those creatures.
invocations.ex: print(maroundfilter(1, false, 'Giant Spider', function(cre) return cre.hppc <= 50 end))
invocations.exDescription: Will print out the amount of creatures with distance 1, with name 'Giant Spider' that have 50 or below of health percent.
